roleset.name: aid

example.name: abet-v: active
example.text: In addition to abetting in the alleged criminal breach of trust, Kwek Hong Png was also charged with dishonestly receiving S$500,000 that had been stolen.
example.arg: in the alleged criminal breach of trust,

example.name: abet-v: passive
example.text: Civilized discourse and an environment where compromise can begin are lost in a hostile posture abetted by superficial media interviews.

example.name: abet-v
example.text: Eight admissions representatives at two of Wilfred's former Massachusetts schools previously pleaded guilty to charges of aiding, abetting and counseling students to submit false financial-aid applications.
example.arg: Eight admissions representatives at two of Wilfred's former Massachusetts schools
students to submit false financial-aid applications.

roleset.note: ABET-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of Vncls help-72.1-1-1. (from abet.01-v)
